CustomField.description: Customer Care team will search SFDC to see if there is a third party opp existing for them and tick this box to let the Adfield team member know that the exhibitor is currently being supported by Customer Care.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Customer Care team will search SFDC to see if there is a third party opp existing for them and tick this box to let the Adfield team member know that the exhibitor is currently being supported by Customer Care.
CustomField.label: Engaged With Customer
